A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Good movie because\, well\, it is a Star Wars movie after all. However\, I feel really let down by the portrayal of Luke as comic relief and not much more.  I am not satisfied with Rey's backstory and the lack of Snoke's.  I don't hate the movie\, but I feel as if Disney has abandoned the \"old\" fans to make way for the \"new\" fans. Just my opinion and you know what they say about those.
